uk.ac.aber.group14.controller

Class WalkController

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.group14.controller.WalkController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWalkController

    public class WalkController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWalkController
    This class is used to control a class implementing the IWalk interface.
    See Also:
    IWalkController

      This is used to make a Parcelable creator for our class.

      Constructor and Description
      WalkController(Parcel source)

      This is the constructor for the controller.

    • Field Detail

      • CREATOR

        public static final  CREATOR
        This is used to make a Parcelable creator for our class. It allows the class to be Parcelable, placed in a bundle, and loaded out of a bundle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WalkController

        public WalkController(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String sd,
              java.lang.String ld)
        This is the constructor for the controller. It takes a name, short description, and long description and initializes a walk with these values.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the walk
        sd - The short description of the walk
        ld - The long description of the walk

      • WalkController

        public WalkController(Parcel source)
        This constructor takes a Parcel and reconstructs the walkController by taking a Walk object from it.
        Parameters:
        source - The Parcel containing the Walk object

      • canUpload

        public boolean canUpload()
        This is used to determine if the walk has the necessary assets to upload it to the server. This returns true if the walk has at least one point of interest and at least one location.
        Specified by:
        canUpload in interface IWalkController
        Returns:
        True or false, depending on whether the walk can be uploaded
        See Also:
        IWalkController.canUpload()
